review_data.title: Le Poisson was disappointing
review_data.content: They claim to be one of the first adresses in Zurich for fish. Beside the fact, that we had to wait very long for the food, the quality of our "Egli" was just poor. Too dry, most probably also the fish waited too long until...More

review_data.title: Very Nice Dinner
review_data.content: Staying in the hotel, we spent a lot of time walking around and decided to have dinner at the hotel. We were very pleased as the dinner was delicious and the service was impeccable. We also had breakfast twice and it was very good both...More

review_data.title: Fun fondue dinner
review_data.content: Enjoyed an excellent cheese fondue with wine for a reasonable cost and good service. Dining is available outdoors or in their lovely appointed restaurant. Salads and sandwiches also looked appealing.More

review_data.title: Great experience
review_data.content: Great service and culinar experience. The restaurant is close to the lake and perfect to close a nice afternoon In the city center. The service is really friendly and eager to give recomendation about local wines! CheersMore

review_data.title: Very good

review_data.title: Hotel restaurant with good location

review_data.title: Good food and a nice ambiente

review_data.title: Nice restaurant in the city close to Bahnhofstrasse
review_data.content: It is an excelent lunch restaurant. The food is good and the service friendly and quick. The food Swiss style, is light and tasty.

review_data.title: Urlaub
review_data.content: Sehr guter Service, Verarbeitung regionaler Produkte, super gegessen. Egal, ob Fisch oder Fleisch, alles ausgezeichnet zubereitet.

review_data.title: Hervorragend

review_data.title: good location
review_data.content: We stayed here and the location was close to lake zurich. the room was decent and the bathroom was lovely. There is BIG construction work going on so its noisy.

review_data.title: Convenient for Hotel Guests
review_data.content: The buffet breakfast each morning was decent with a small selection of offerings. Dinner was good but not remarkable except for the 20 CHF voucher for meals over 40 CHF that is given to hotel guests. We ordered the veal dish (nothing to rave about...More

review_data.title: excellent despite staying only one night

review_data.title: Very nice hotel
review_data.content: The check in was fast and the people at the reception very friendly and proficient. I got an upgrade to a comfort room. I was also offered a free drink at the bar. The complimentary minibar and having a coffee machine was also an asset....More
